definitions.definition: Sovereign; independent; having authority or right to allegiance.
Serving an independent sovereign or master; bound by a feudal tenure ; obliged to be faithful and loyal to a superior, such as a vassal to his lord; faithful.
examples: a liege man; a liege subject

main_definition: Sovereign; independent; having authority or right to allegiance.
secondary_definitions: Serving an independent sovereign or master; bound by a feudal tenure ; obliged to be faithful and loyal to a superior, such as a vassal to his lord; faithful.
( obsolete , law ) Full; perfect; complete; pure.
